pages.text: $(li)Banana Bundles can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/jungle/jungle)Jungles$(/l).$(br)$(li)If you break a Banana Bundle, it will drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/neapolitan/banana_bunch)Banana Bunch$(/l), but an aggressive $(l:patchouli:creatures/neapolitan/plantain_spider)Plantain Spider$(/l) may appears too.
